title: Saudi Arabia : mobile phone internet users 2017 to 2023
yAxis: Number of mobile phone internet users in millions
summary: In general Number of mobile phone internet users in millions has rose over the Year.
Number of mobile phone internet users in millions is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2021.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2019 and 2020.
Maximum Number of mobile phone internet users in millions, about 21.7 was reported at Year 2021
Minimum Number of mobile phone internet users in millions about 19.6 was reached at Year 2017
